title: assign more ward skins to your ward layout
body:
people without using a ward skin:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/360316655592669195/438601708000641025/unknown.png

using a ward skin makes every ward type look the same
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/360316655592669195/438603861293400074/unknown.png

so why not assign 4 different skins for each ward type?

replies.body: Probably because it would be confusing as hell. There are already wards of different types and plenty of skins to go with them. The simple option would be to have chromas for the more popular kinds of wards.
how would it be confusing?
how would it be confusing at all. it's an item that sits there just giving vision

> [{quoted}](name=Cybernetic Ghost,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bAGXxvXs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-14T17:38:44.761+0000)
>
> Probably because it would be confusing as hell. There are already wards of different types and plenty of skins to go with them. The simple option would be to have chromas for the more popular kinds of wards.

they have clear indicators by the icon floating on top of them, and their health bar.

despite all the different ward skins that exist now, not once did i get into the situation where i didnt recognize a ward as a ward. 

i posted a suggestion like this before. it would be cool if the client had a tab for ward skins to equip similar to the emotes. you can assign a different skin for each ward type. that way you could take 4 ward skins into 1 game.

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bAGXxvXs,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2018-06-14T18:36:36.158+0000)
>
> i posted a suggestion like this before. it would be cool if the client had a tab for ward skins to equip similar to the emotes. you can assign a different skin for each ward type. that way you could take 4 ward skins into 1 game.

I love this idea
As a support main, logged in to say this is a great idea.  Everything else seems to be stabbing me in the eye lately, but multiple ward skin equips would actually make me kind of happy ^.^
How could it possibly be any more confusing than using *the same skin for each kind of ward*?

Would be pretty nice. Sucks you can only show off one ward skin at a time. I'd love to have all my wards look different, and it's hard to just pick one skin to use for wards. I've been using my level 100 ward skin, but I'd like to be able to use some of my other ones too, like my Vamporo bat thingy one.

im currently unsure: zombie wards
do they always look like this?
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/89/Zombie_Ward.png/revision/latest?cb=20171031130147

or do they use your currently assigned ward skin?

sooo......
zombie ward skins are unaffected by ward skins
Yes, and there's good reason for that. Zombie wards have to be distinguished from farsight wards quickly and easily, so they keep zombie wards like that.
They always look like that, yes.
I hope you are talking about customizing ward skins so that each type of ward you can use a different skin that'd be awesome :D

yes like
penta kill control ward
mimi stealth ward
divine sword farsight ward
def not a ward totem ward

I say Riot should do it. If not for a Quality of Life change for the players, it gives more reason for us to buy more Ward skins riot

Yeah I would pay money to see this. This is the right direction.

Is...  is there a _reason_ you swapped the control ward and normal wards placements?  Cause if not...  just kind of fuck you for that.

Kappa, good idea tbh.
didnt remember the first arrangement and placed the 2nd randomly
Yes please! More variety to ward skins in the game would be great considering I have so many.

Definitely! 

Some skins even look better with certain icons over the others.

one is totem ward (trinket)
the other is "stealth" ward because it looks like a plant (support item)
